name: Looking Glass Island
description:
Synopsis:

Looking Glass Island centers around a group of friends partying on a Yacht.  They encounter a mysterious mist that knocks them unconscious. When they wake up they find themselves stranded on an island, in what they soon find to be unfamiliar territory searching for one of the friends in the group.

How To Play: 

Use your mouse and click the prompted choices. 

Please Note:

This is a Demo.  Also, if you run into a problems with either the PC or Mac build please let us know Via Twitter @TeamMixedMedia  we will respond asap.
